name: Cuisses of Akkhan
flavorText: "Let the crusaders wrap their legs in plate of wondrous strength. Their stride will take them to the salvation of the Zakarum faith. Thus shall Akarat's word be cleansed." -Akkhan
flavorTextHtml: "Let the crusaders wrap their legs in plate of wondrous strength. Their stride will take them to the salvation of the Zakarum faith. Thus shall Akarat's word be cleansed." -Akkhan
setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 Reduce the cost of all abilities by 50% while Akarat's Champion is active.(4) Set:     
 Reduce the cooldown of Akarat's Champion by 50%.(6) Set:     
 While Akarat's Champion is active, you deal 2000% increased damage and take 50% less damage.
